column2: BRIEF-Weis Markets Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.60 May 7 (Reuters) - Weis Markets Inc: * WEIS MARKETS REPORTS 1ST QUARTER SALES, COMPARABLE STORE SALES AND NET INCOME INCREASES * QTRLY COMPARABLE STORE SALES, ADJUSTED FOR HOLIDAY SHIFT, INCREASED 1.5 PERCENT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
